snippet: Food poisoning at a Mission District restaurant puts a spotlight on the absence of any law requiring businesses to report such incidents.
lead_paragraph: Food poisoning at a Mission District restaurant puts a spotlight on the absence of any law requiring businesses to report such incidents.

headline.seo: Unreported Food Poisoning at San Francisco Restaurant Spotlights Absence of Law
headline.main: Unreported Cases of Food Poisoning Reflect a Gap in Food Supply Safety Net
headline.print_headline: Unreported Cases of Food Poisoning Reflect a Gap in Food Supply Safety Net
